mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `backstage_permission` bp LEFT JOIN `backstage_role_permission` brp ON bp.id = brp.permissionId LEFT JOIN `backstage_role` br ON brp.roleId = br.id LEFT JOIN `backstage_user_role` bur ON bur.roleId = br.id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.id = bur.userId WHERE u.username = #{username}
